title: FS or trade: Many T206 HOFers w/tough backs and misc.
author: Kotton King

posts.post_title: FS or trade: Many T206 HOFers w/tough backs and misc.
posts.post_content:
I have decided to abandon my project of trying to complete a T206's back set with mostly HOFers. 

[url]http://s84.photobucket.com/albums/k14/crazylocomerk2/T206/[/url] 

I am making the majority of my collection available for sale.

First to email me with the intent to purchase gets the card(s).  Prices include shipping and DC.  For the more valuable cards and multiple card purchases, I will pay the insurance, otherwise it is on the buyer if they want it.

Looking for Check or MO as payment options.  Paypal could be a possibility if you are willing to cover the fees.

Email me at: [url]crazylocomerk@yahoo.com[/url]

Link to my cards:
[url]http://s84.photobucket.com/albums/k14/crazylocomerk2/T206/[/url]

T206 HOFers and Misc. still available:


-Griffith (batting) w/SC factory 42 overprint PSA 4
-Johnson (portrait) w/Sovereign 150 PSA 2
-Lajoie (bat on shoulder) w/Old Mill BVG 2.5
-Mathewson (portrait) PSA 1
-Willis (throwing) w/Polar Bear SGC 40
-Cy Young (glove showing) SGC 40
-Bresnahan (portrait) w/EPDG SGC 40
-Johnson (pitching) w/LENOX SGC 20
-Mathewson (dark cap) SGC 30 SOLD
-Birmingham w/Sovereign 350 PSA 1 TRADED
-Bresnahan batting BL350 SGC 20 SOLD
-Tinker (bat off shoulder) w/Sovereign 350 SGC 40 TRADED
-Joss (pitching) BVG 3.5 SOLD
-Evers (Cubs on shirt) SGC 40 SOLD
-Flick SGC 40 SOLD
-Speaker SGC 40 SOLD
-Wheat SGC 40 SOLD
-McQuallan w/Blank Back ON HOLD

Prices for each found at the link:
[url]http://s84.photobucket.com/albums/k14/crazylocomerk2/T206/[/url]

posts.post_title: Open to trades.  Or feel free to make a reasonable offer.
posts.post_content:
Feel free to make reasonable offers on any of the remaining cards.  I have a little wiggle room on some, on others not so much.

I'm also open to trades.  Looking for T216's (Kotton, MINO, VE) in any condition. Or anything else that catches my eye (E94's, E98's, E107's, rarities, etc.).

Or I'm just looking to buy T216's if you're selling.
